instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00138: What is 820-00138? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-00163: What is 820-00163? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message:
Hi All,

This MLB no liquid damaged and very weird behaviour.
It boots to logo in screen and freezes. When you connect to external monitor, both internal and external  displays work fine. works fine with 
only external as well. but it freezes with internal display only. tried to different screens and also  putting the MLB to known working top case and screen still same. I replaced all CPU mosfets with new mosfets still the same.  Any advice really appreciate.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message:
Tried NVRAM?

Shouldn't be the problem, but discard a software issue.
Test with other macOS, USB or different SSD.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message:
Hi Thank you for your reply.

I tried NVRAM as well as NVRAM, clean me , new bios using medusa. Tried with external USB and different SSD. Same issue.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message:
Really weird issue, as this board doesn't have dedicated GPU.
Doesn't even has separated iGPU power supply.
But something happens with iGPU I suppose.

Did you change all <CHIP>U7310</CHIP>/20/30?
I hope not with same FDMF6808N...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message: Yes it is weird issue that I never faced. I already replaced 3 FDMF6808N with new chips from mouser. still same behaviour.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message:
What chip did you use?
New FDMF6808N doesn't exist.
Mouser shouldn't have it in stock even; considering is serious seller.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message:
Wow. if that is the case I'm lucky as I bought  them August 2019. Anyway I replaced these 3 chips and seems they are woking fine as I get 1.7+ V , on coils.
Is there any relation other than iGPU between screen  connector and external display?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message:
Hi, Finally I figured the fault and fixed. Thought to share the repair as it useful for others. 
Issue was with <TRANSISTOR>Q2010</TRANSISTOR>, LCD HDP inverter.  <SIGNAL>DP_IG_A_HPD_L</SIGNAL> signal was missing. I pulled <TRANSISTOR>Q2010</TRANSISTOR> and found pad was completely burnt. Had to run a wire. all good. So this is solved. I have other one <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00163</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> which I'm going to open a new threat. Thank you very much for your support.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message:
Thanks for feedback, as that is very strange issue.

BTW, you didn't say what chips used to replace on CPU power supply.
Keep in mind, REAL new FDMF6808N didn't exist ever, for large public; it was Apple property.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message: Hi As I said these FMDF6808N chips I bought them Aug 2019. I used them and had 6pcs. I didn't know that they are not available. How ever they are still available in Aliexpress.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message:
I've never seen FDMF6808N available from any official suppliers. Mouser has FDMF6708N and FMDF3030 which are compatible though.
The stuff on Aliexpress is never new, pulled from dead board so of course it must not be used in this case.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00138</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Works Fine with External Display. Inter display Freezes
threads.message: Correction. You are right. My chips are not FMDF6808N, its 6708N.
